title: Windows XP/Vista/7 Games for Windows 8
description:
This package is a collection of Microsoft games released as parts of earlier Windows versions but modified so that they can run on Windows 8. It's based on a package published on BetaArchive which was configured for slipstreaming onto Windows 8 setup discs and as such lacked a standalone installer, so I made this batch installer based on it (all credits go to the original uploader).

NOTE: This collection only contains the 64-bit versions of the games, so a 64-bit Windows is a must.


Games included in the collection
--------------------------------

Windows XP: Pinball

Windows Vista Ultimate Extras: Hold 'Em, InkBall, Tinker (with Tinker Editor and a collection of extra custom levels)

Windows 7: Chess Titans, FreeCell, Hearts, Internet Backgammon, Internet Checkers, Internet Spades, Mahjong Titans, Minesweeper, Purple Place, Solitaire, Spider, Solitaire
